{{Description|In the depths of a mysterious Domain, treacherous foes of even more mysterious origins are preparing for battle... Carefully analyze the opposing lineup and adapt to swiftly dispatch your foes!}}
'''Triumphant Frenzy''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 4.4]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2024/02/15 10:00:00 – 2024/02/26 03:59:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 20 or above

===Summary===
* For 5 days after the start of the event, a new challenge will become available each day.
* Each challenge will have four rounds of battle. Before the first round of every challenge, you can select four characters to form a team, and before each following challenge round, you can select two characters to join the team.
* Every character starts with 2 Resolve. Each time a character takes part in a combat round, they will lose 1 Resolve. Characters who run out of Resolve cannot continue to be deployed.
* Each challenge will have a unique type of "Roiling Resolve": Special effects will be obtained based on the total Resolve of the team members. Pay attention to these effects and use them effectively to obtain their benefits in battle.
* The trial characters available in this gameplay mode will inherit the same Constellation levels of the characters owned by the Traveler.

;Challenge Difficulty
{|class="article-table"
!Difficulty !! Opponent Level !! Time Per Round
|-
|Normal || 75 ||600s
|-
|Advanced || 80 || 150s
|-
|Pro || 85 || 90s
|}

==Challenges==
===Rhythmic Quickstep===
{{Description|The Domain is extremely chaotic, just as the battlefield is constantly changing. When characters in your party have their {{Color|help|HP increase or decrease}}, that character's CRIT Rate will be increased. Stay vigilant, keep a close eye on the condition of your party members, and eradicate your foes, step by step!}}
Unlocks 2023-02-15 10{{Colon}}00

;Opponent Details
* Round 1: {{Enemy List|x=0|Large Overgrown Breacher Primus; Whirling Pyro Fungus; Whirling Electro Fungus; Winged Cryoshroom;Grounded Geoshroom}}
* Round 2: {{Enemy List|x=0|Tainted Water-Spouting Phantasm; Frostarm Lawachurl; Fatui Skirmisher - Cryogunner Legionnaire}}
* Round 3: {{Enemy List|x=0|Primordial Bathysmal Vishap; Ruin Grader; Nobushi: Jintouban}}
* Round 4: {{Enemy List|x=0|Assault Specialist Mek - Ousia; Ruin Guard; Geological Survey Mek - Pneuma; Recon Log Mek - Pneuma}}

;Roiling Resolve
Roiling Resolve will grant levels of buffs that correspond to your party members' total Resolve.<br>When a character's {{Color|help|current HP increases or decreases}}, the active character's CRIT Rate will increase by {{Tt|{{Color|help|3%}}|At 4+ Resolve}}/{{Tt|{{Color|help|10%}}|At 6+ Resolve}} for {{Color|help|8}}s. This can be triggered once every {{Color|help|0.5}}s. Max {{Color|help|6}} stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently. This effect will be canceled once the character leaves the field.
